DataElement.preferredName: Moderate Exercise Physical Activity Assessment Week Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information relating to a physical activity assessment involving moderate exercise per week.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to a physical activity assessment involving moderate exercise.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Moderate exercise is defined as 20-60 minutes of exercise which elevates your heart rate to 60-80% of your maximum heart rate performed at least 3-4 times per week. Your maximum heart rate is approximately 220 minus your age. Moderate exercises include basketball, singles tennis, downhill skiing, and moderate walking.:Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc. (from NIDDK Glossary; http://www.niddk.nih.gov/health/nutrit/pubs/glossary/glossaryintro.htm)

Concepts.definition: Moderate exercise is defined as 20-60 minutes of exercise which elevates your heart rate to 60-80% of your maximum heart rate performed at least 3-4 times per week. Your maximum heart rate is approximately 220 minus your age. Moderate exercises include basketball, singles tennis, downhill skiing, and moderate walking.

Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc. (from NIDDK Glossary; http://www.niddk.nih.gov/health/nutrit/pubs/glossary/glossaryintro.htm)

Property.preferredDefinition: Examination of the body by auscultation, palpation, percussion, inspection, and olfaction.  (Taber's)

Concepts.definition: A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion and auscultation. The purpose is to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for an individual's health assessment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: information on quality of patient life and ability to function

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Any period of seven consecutive days._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

PermissibleValues.value: Yes Less than one week out of every month

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.: The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.: Any period of seven consecutive days.: Every month.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.
Any period of seven consecutive days.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A natural number greater than 1 and less than 3 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of one and one.: Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.: A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.: Any period of seven consecutive days.: Every month.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 1 and less than 3 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of one and one.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.
Any period of seven consecutive days.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Any period of seven consecutive days.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: Any period of seven consecutive days.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Do you walk or do other moder
ReferenceDocuments.description: Do you walk or do other moderate or vigorous activity for 30+ minutes at least three days per week?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: At the time of consent, did patient or parent/guardian report less than 420 minutes of moderate to vigorous physical activity over the last week?
